tutorial_part.name: COMPLETING_TASK
tutorial_part.top_text: Direct your {color=green}crew members{/color} to complete {color=#ff00ff}tasks{/color} - you can tell if a {color=#ff00ff}task{/color} is being worked on by the white outline
tutorial_part.bottom_text: Leaving {color=#ff00ff}tasks{/color} uncompleted will degrade a {color=orange}ship aspect{/color} and completing them will improve that {color=orange}ship aspect

tutorial_part.name: CREW_MEMBER_MOVEMENT
tutorial_part.top_text: {color=black}Left click{/color} on {color=#c3c3c3}nodes{/color} (grey boxes) to direct your selected {color=green}crew member{/color} there or to a {color=#ff00ff}task{/color} for them to complete
tutorial_part.bottom_text: {color=green}Crew members{/color} have {color=#4b0082}roles{/color} which determine what {color=#ff00ff}tasks{/color} they can do - {color=red}crew members will not go to tasks they cannot do{/color}
tutorial_part.extra_text:
{color=black}Press tab to pause{/color} and view which {color=green}crew member{/color} can do which {color=#ff00ff}task{/color} and access the tutorial again
Your {color=green}crew members{/color} have {color=black}levels{/color} (1-10) which affects how quickly they complete {color=#ff00ff}tasks{/color} and how much they improve {color=orange}ship aspects{/color}

tutorial_part.name: CREW_SELECTION
tutorial_part.top_text: {color=black}Left click{/color} on a {color=green}crew member{/color} on the ship or on the selection bar at the top to select a {color=green}crew member{/color}
tutorial_part.extra_text: If multiple {color=green}crew members{/color} are on the same {color=#c3c3c3}node{/color} (grey boxes), it may be hard to select the {color=green}crew member{/color} you want. In this case, use the selection bar at the top

tutorial_part.name: LOSE_SCREEN
tutorial_part.top_text: Keep your {color=orange}ship aspects{/color} in order by completing {color=#ff00ff}tasks{/color} as quickly as possible
tutorial_part.bottom_text: Your difficulty level will determine how far from earth you'll start, the initial {color=orange}ship aspects{/color} and your {color=green}crew members'{/color} {color=black}levels{/color}
tutorial_part.extra_text: You will lose if the {color=red}hull integrity{/color} or {color=green}life support efficiency{/color} reaches 0%, or if the {color=black}crew stress{/color} reaches 300

tutorial_part.name: TASK_GENERATION
tutorial_part.top_text: {color=#ff00ff}Tasks{/color} will be generated every few seconds - rooms will generate specific types of {color=#ff00ff}tasks{/color}

tutorial_part.name: WIN_SCREEN
tutorial_part.top_text: Your {color=#00ffff}ship speed{/color} (warp speed: 1-50) determines how quickly you will get back to Earth
tutorial_part.extra_text:
You will see how far along in the game you are by looking at the current {color=blue}phase{/color} in the bottom right corner
You win by keeping your {color=orange}ship aspects{/color} in order until you reach Earth
{color=yellow}Good Luck!{/color} Press tab to start playing
